cells.content: 春，沛公為漢王，之南鄭。秋，還定雍。
cells.translation: Spring: Lord Pei becomes Han King and goes to Nanzheng. Autumn: Returns and pacifies Yong.

cells.content: 春，定塞、翟、魏、河南、韓、殷國。夏，伐項籍，至彭城。立太子。還據滎陽。
cells.translation: Spring: Pacifies Sai, Di, Wei, Henan, Han, and Yin states. Summer: Attacks Xiang Ji, reaches Pengcheng. Establishes Crown Prince. Returns and holds Xingyang.

cells.content: 魏豹反。使韓信別定魏，伐趙。楚圍我滎陽。
cells.translation: Wei Bao rebels. Sends Han Xin to separately pacify Wei and attack Zhao. Chu surrounds our Xingyang.

cells.content: 使韓信別定齊及燕，太公自楚歸，與楚界洪渠。
cells.translation: Sends Han Xin to separately pacify Qi and Yan. Duke returns from Chu; establishes boundary with Chu at Hongqu.
Lu Wan. Zhou Ke guards Xingyang and dies.

cells.content: 冬，破楚垓下，殺項籍。春，王踐皇帝位定陶。。入都關中。
cells.translation: Winter: Defeats Chu at Gaixia, kills Xiang Ji. Spring: King ascends to emperor at Dingtao. Enters capital at Guanzhong.

cells.content: 尊太公為太上皇。劉仲為代王。立大市。更命咸陽曰長安。
cells.translation: Twelve states establish kings. Winter: Moves capital to Luoyang.

cells.content: 六。封為酇侯。。張蒼為計相。
長樂宮成，自櫟陽徙長安。伐匈奴，匈奴圍我平城。
cells.translation: Winter: Hunts at Yongqiu. Is captured by Xiongnu at Baideng. Spring: Returns.

cells.content: 擊韓信反虜於趙城。貫高作亂，明年覺，誅之。匈奴攻代王，代王棄國亡，廢為郃陽侯。
cells.translation: Winter: Hunts at Ganquan. Moves capital to Chang'an.

cells.content: 未央宮成，置酒前殿，太上皇輦上坐，帝奉玉卮上壽，曰：「始常以臣不如仲力，今臣功孰與仲多？」太上皇笑，殿上稱萬歲。徙齊田，楚昭、屈、景于關中。
cells.translation: Winter: Hunts at Shanglin. Empress Lü kills Zhao King Ruyi. Establishes Yuan as Crown Prince.
Autumn: Hunts at Xinfeng. Yan King Zang Tu rebels, sends Lu Wan to attack and kill him.
Winter: Hunts at Changle. Spring: Reduces army, returns to farming.

cells.content: 周勃為太尉。攻代。後官省。
冬，擊布。還過沛。夏，上崩，葬長陵。
cells.translation: Fourth month: Emperor passes away at Chang'an. Crown Prince ascends as Emperor Hui.

cells.content: 趙隱王如意死。始作長安城西北方。除諸侯丞相為相。
楚元王、齊悼惠王來朝。七月辛未，何薨。
十四。七月癸巳，齊相平陽侯曹參為相國。
初作長安城。蜀湔氐反。擊之。
為高祖立廟於沛城成，置歌兒一百二十人。八月乙丑，參卒。
七月，齊悼惠王薨。立太倉、西市。
cells.translation: Ninth month: Emperor Hui passes away. Empress Lü establishes Yuan as Emperor.

cells.content: 一。十月己巳，安國侯王陵為右丞相。曲逆侯陳平為左丞相。
廣阿侯任敖為御史大夫。
上崩。大臣用張辟彊計，呂氏權重，以呂台為呂王。立少帝。九月辛巳，葬安陵。
cells.translation: Tenth month: Emperor passes away. Empress Lü establishes Gong as Emperor.

cells.content: 王孝惠諸子。置孝悌力田。
cells.translation: Eleventh month: Emperor Gong passes away. Empress Lü establishes Yi as Emperor.

cells.content: 三。十一月甲子，徙平為右丞相。辟陽侯審食其為左丞相。
十二月，呂王台薨，子嘉代立為呂王。行八銖錢。
cells.translation: Spring: Enfeoffs Lü clan as Lü Wang.

cells.content: 平陽侯曹窋為御史大夫。。
廢少帝，更立常山王弘為帝。
cells.translation: Deposes Young Emperor, establishes Changshan King Hong as Emperor.
Wang Ling. Chen Ping. Establishes Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 八月，淮陽王薨，以其弟壺關侯武為淮陽王。令戍卒歲更。
cells.translation: Eighth month: Huaiyang King passes away, establishes his younger brother Marquis of Huguan Wu as Huaiyang King. Orders garrison troops annual rotation.

cells.content: 以呂產為呂王。四月丁酉，赦天下。晝昏。
cells.translation: Establishes Lü Chan as Lü King. Fourth month: Amnesty to all under heaven. Solar eclipse.

cells.content: 趙王幽死，以呂祿為趙王。梁王徙趙，自殺。
cells.translation: Zhao King dies in confinement, establishes Lü Lu as Zhao King. Liang King moves to Zhao, commits suicide.

cells.content: 七月，高后崩。九月，誅諸呂。後九月，代王至，踐皇帝位。後九月，食其免相。
cells.translation: Seventh month: Empress Gao passes away. Ninth month: Executes all Lü clan. Ninth month after: Dai King arrives, ascends emperor position. Ninth month after: Shi Qi dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 十。七月辛巳，為帝太傅。九月壬戌，復為丞相。八
cells.translation: Chen Ping. Seventh month: Becomes Emperor's Grand Tutor. Ninth month: Again becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 五。隆慮侯灶為將軍，擊南越。
cells.translation: Zhou Bo. Long Lü Hou Cao becomes general, strikes Nanyue.

cells.content: 除收孥相坐律。立太子。賜民爵。
cells.translation: Abolishes confiscation of family for crimes law. Establishes Crown Prince. Grants people nobility ranks.

cells.content: 十一。十一月辛巳，平徙為左丞相。太尉絳侯周勃為右丞相。
cells.translation: Eleven. Eleventh month xin si, Ping moves as Left Chancellor. Grand Commandant Jiang Hou Zhou Bo becomes Right Chancellor.

cells.content: 六。勃為相，潁陰侯灌嬰為太尉。
cells.translation: Six. Bo becomes chancellor, Yingyin Hou Guan Ying becomes Grand Commandant.

cells.content: 除誹謗律。皇子武為代王，參為太原王，揖為梁王。十月，丞相平薨。
cells.translation: Abolishes slander law. Imperial son Wu becomes Dai King, Shen becomes Taiyuan King, Yi becomes Liang King. Tenth month, Chancellor Ping passes away.

cells.content: 一。十一月乙亥，絳侯勃復為丞相。
cells.translation: One. Eleventh month yi hai, Jiang Hou Bo again becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 徙代王武為淮陽王。上幸太原。濟北王反。匈奴大入上郡。以地盡與太原，太原更號代。十一月壬子，勃免相，之國。
cells.translation: Moves Dai King Wu to Huaiyang King. Emperor visits Taiyuan. Jibei King rebels. Xiongnu greatly enter Shangjun. Gives all territory to Taiyuan, Taiyuan changes name to Dai. Eleventh month ren zi, Bo dismissed from chancellor, returns to state.

cells.content: 一。十二月乙亥，太尉潁陰侯灌嬰為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: One. Twelfth month yi hai, Grand Commandant Yingyin Hou Guan Ying becomes Chancellor. Abolishes Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 二。棘蒲侯陳武為大將軍，擊濟北。昌侯盧卿、共侯盧罷師、甯侯鸱、深澤侯將夜皆為將軍，屬武祁侯賀，將兵屯滎陽。
cells.translation: Two. Ji Pu Hou Chen Wu becomes Grand General, strikes Jibei. Chang Hou Lu Qing, Gong Hou Lu Ba Shi, Ning Hou Chi, Shen Ze Hou Jiang Ye all become generals, subordinate to Wu Qi Hou He, lead troops garrison at Xingyang.
Twelfth month ji si, Ying passes away.

cells.content: 一。正月甲午，御史大夫北平侯張蒼為丞相。
cells.translation: One. First month jia wu, Imperial Secretary Marquis of Beiping Zhang Cang becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 安丘侯張說為將軍，擊胡，出代。
cells.translation: An Qiu Hou Zhang Yue becomes general, strikes Hu, exits Dai.

cells.content: 關中侯申屠嘉為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Guanzhong Hou Shen Tu Jia becomes Imperial Secretary.
Abolishes coin law, people may cast coins

cells.content: 廢淮南王，遷嚴道，道死雍。
cells.translation: Deposes Huainan King, moves Yan Dao, dies en route at Yong.
Fourth month bing zi, first establishes Nan Ling.
Master of Carriages Runyin Hou Teng Gong passes away.

cells.content: 溫室鐘自鳴。以芷陽鄉為霸陵。
cells.translation: Wen Shi bell rings by itself. Makes Zhi Yang township Ba Mausoleum.
All commandery kings come to Chang'an.

cells.content: 河決東郡金隄。徙淮陽王為梁王。
cells.translation: Yellow River breaches Dongjun Jin Di. Moves Huaiyang King to Liang King.

cells.content: 除肉刑及田租稅律、戍卒令。
cells.translation: Abolishes mutilating punishments and field rent tax laws, garrison troops order.

cells.content: 匈奴大入蕭關，發兵擊之，及屯長安旁。
cells.translation: Xiongnu greatly enter Xiao Pass, sends troops to strike them, and garrison beside Chang'an.

cells.content: 成侯董赤、內史欒布、昌侯盧卿、隆慮侯灶、甯侯鸱皆為將軍，東陽侯張相如為大將軍，皆擊匈奴。中尉周舍、郎中令張武皆為將軍，屯長安旁。
cells.translation: Cheng Hou Dong Chi, Interior Minister Luan Bu, Chang Hou Lu Qing, Long Lü Hou Cao, Ning Hou Chi all become generals, Dong Yang Hou Zhang Xiang Ru becomes Grand General, all strike Xiongnu. Commandant Zhou She, Palace Gentleman Commander Zhang Wu all become generals, garrison beside Chang'an.

cells.content: 黃龍見成紀。上始郊見雍五帝。
cells.translation: Yellow dragon appears at Cheng Ji. Emperor first suburban sacrifice sees Yong five emperors.
Emperor first suburban sacrifice sees Wei Yang five emperors.

cells.content: 新垣平詐言方士，覺，誅之。
cells.translation: Xin Yuan Ping deceives with magicians, discovered, executes him.

cells.content: 匈奴和親。地動。八月戊辰，蒼免相。
cells.translation: Xiongnu peace marriage. Earth movement. Eighth month wu chen, Cang dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 十五。八月庚午，御史大夫申屠嘉為丞相，封故安侯。
cells.translation: Fifteen. Eighth month geng wu, Imperial Secretary Shen Tu Jia becomes Chancellor, sealed as Marquis of Gu An.

cells.content: 匈奴三萬人入上郡，二萬人入雲中。
cells.translation: Xiongnu three thousand enter Shangjun, two thousand enter Yunzhong.

cells.content: 以中大夫令免為車騎將軍，軍飛狐，故楚相蘇意為將軍，軍句注；。將軍張武屯北地；河內守周亞夫為將軍，軍細柳；宗正劉禮軍霸上；祝茲侯徐厲軍棘門：以備胡。數月，胡去，亦罷。
cells.translation: Makes Central Court Gentleman Ling Mian chariot cavalry general, army at Feihu, former Chu chancellor Su Yi general, army at Gouzhu; General Zhang Wu garrison Beidi; Hedong governor Zhou Yafu general, army Xi Liu; Imperial Kinsman Liu Li army Ba Shang; Zhu Ci Hou Xu Li army Ji Men: to prepare for Hu. Several months, Hu depart, also disband.

cells.content: 六月己亥，孝文皇帝崩。丁未，太子立。民出臨三日，葬霸陵。
cells.translation: Sixth month ji hai, Filial Wen Emperor passes away. Ding wei, Crown Prince ascends. People mourn three days, buried at Ba Mausoleum.

cells.content: 中尉亞夫為車騎將軍，郎中令張武為復土將軍，屬國捍為將屯將軍。詹事戎奴為車騎將軍，侍太后。
cells.translation: Commandant Yafu becomes chariot cavalry general, Palace Gentleman Commander Zhang Wu becomes Covering Earth general, Protector of Dependent States Han becomes Garrison General. Palace Steward Rong Nu becomes chariot cavalry general, serves Empress Dowager.

cells.content: 立孝文皇帝廟，郡國為太宗廟。
cells.translation: Establishes Filial Wen Emperor temple, commanderies and states as Grand Ancestor temples.
Seven. Establishes Minister over the Masses office.

cells.content: 立皇子德為河閒王，閼為臨江王，餘為淮陽王，非為汝南王，彭祖為廣川王，發為長沙王。四月中，孝文太后崩。嘉卒。
cells.translation: Establishes imperial son De as Hejian King, Yan as Linjiang King, Yu as Huaiyang King, Fei as Runan King, Peng Zu as Guangchuan King, Fa as Changsha King. Fourth month middle, Filial Wen Empress Dowager passes away. Jia passes away.
Eight. Kai Feng Hou Tao Qing becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 吳楚七國反，發兵擊，皆破之。皇子端為膠西王，勝為中山王。
cells.translation: Wu Chu seven states rebel, sends troops to strike, all defeat them. Imperial son Duan becomes Jiaoxi King, Sheng becomes Zhongshan King.

cells.content: 中尉條侯周亞夫。為太尉，擊吳楚；曲周侯酈寄為將軍，擊趙；竇嬰為大將軍，屯滎陽，欒布為將軍，擊齊。
cells.translation: Commandant Marquis of Tiao Zhou Yafu. Becomes Grand Commandant, strikes Wu Chu; Qu Zhou Hou Li Ji becomes general, strikes Zhao; Dou Ying becomes Grand General, garrison Xingyang, Luan Bu becomes general, strikes Qi.

cells.content: 置陽陵邑。丞相北平侯張蒼卒。
cells.translation: Establishes Yang Mausoleum town. Chancellor Bei Ping Hou Zhang Cang passes away.
Moves Guangchuan King Peng Zu to Zhao King.
Imperial Secretary Yang Ling Hou Cen Mai.

cells.content: 廢太子榮為臨江王。四月丁巳，膠東王立為太子。青罷相。
cells.translation: Deposes Crown Prince Rong as Linjiang King. Fourth month ding si, Jiaodong King established as Crown Prince. Qing dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 六月乙巳，太尉條侯亞夫為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: Sixth month yi si, Grand Commandant Marquis of Tiao Zhou Yafu becomes Chancellor. Abolishes Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 皇子越為廣川王，寄為膠東王。
cells.translation: Imperial son Yue becomes Guangchuan King, Ji becomes Jiaodong King.

cells.content: 皇子乘為清河王。亞夫免相。
cells.translation: Imperial son Cheng becomes Qinghe King. Yafu dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫桃侯劉舍為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Imperial Secretary Tao Hou Liu She becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 臨江王徵，自殺，葬藍田，燕數萬為銜士置冢上。
cells.translation: Linjiang King summoned, commits suicide, buried at Lan Tian, Yan several tens of thousands make clay figures placed on tomb.
Imperial son Shun becomes Changshan King.

cells.content: 梁孝王武薨。分梁為五國，王諸子：子買為梁王，明為濟川王，彭離為濟東王，定為山陽王，不識為濟陰王。
cells.translation: Liang Xiao King Wu passes away. Divides Liang into five states, kings various sons: son Mai becomes Liang King, Ming becomes Ji Chuan King, Peng Li becomes Ji Dong King, Ding becomes Shan Yang King, Bu Shi becomes Ji Yin King.

cells.content: 五月，地動。七月乙巳，日蝕。舍免相。
cells.translation: Fifth month, earth movement. Seventh month yi si, solar eclipse. She dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 五。八月壬辰，御史大夫建陵侯衛綰為丞相。
cells.translation: Five. Eighth month ren chen, Imperial Secretary Jian Ling Hou Wei Wan becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 六月丁丑，御史大夫岑邁卒。
cells.translation: Sixth month ding chou, Imperial Secretary Cen Mai passes away.

cells.content: 正月甲子，孝景皇帝崩。二月丙子，太子立。
cells.translation: First month jia zi, Filial Jing Emperor passes away. Second month bing zi, Crown Prince ascends.
Filial Wu Jian Yuan first year

cells.content: 四。魏其侯竇嬰為丞相。置太尉。
cells.translation: Four. Wei Qi Hou Dou Ying becomes Chancellor. Establishes Grand Commandant.
Wu An Hou Tian Fen becomes Grand Commandant.
Establishes Mao Mausoleum. Ying dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 二月乙未，太常柏至侯許昌為丞相。蚡免太尉。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: Second month yi wei, Grand Master of Ceremonies Bai Zhi Hou Xu Chang becomes Chancellor. Fen dismissed from Grand Commandant. Abolishes Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 東甌王廣武侯望率其眾四萬餘人來降，處廬江郡。
cells.translation: Dong Ou King Guang Wu Hou Wang leads his multitude over forty thousand people to surrender, places in Lujiang commandery.

cells.content: 正月，閩越王反。孝景太后崩。。昌免相。
cells.translation: First month, Min Yue King rebels. Filial Jing Empress Dowager passes away. Chang dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 五。六月癸巳，武安侯田蚡為丞相。
cells.translation: Five. Sixth month gui si, Wu An Hou Tian Fen becomes Chancellor.
Qing Di becomes Crown Prince Grand Tutor.
Emperor first visits Yong, suburban sacrifice sees five altars.

cells.content: 夏，御史大夫韓安國為護軍將軍，衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，大行王恢為將屯將軍，太中大夫李息為材官將軍，篡單于馬邑，不合，誅恢。
cells.translation: Summer, Imperial Secretary Han An Guo becomes Protector General, Guard Commander Li Guang becomes Brave Cavalry General, Master of Carriages Gong Sun He becomes Light Chariot General, Grand Usher Wang Hui becomes Garrison General, Palace Attendant Li Xi becomes Timber Officer General, ambush Chanyu at Mai Yi, unsuccessful, executes Hui.
Fifth month bing zi, Yellow River breaches at Hulu Zi.
Twelfth month ding hai, earth movement. Fen passes away.
Five. Ping Ji Hou Xue Ze becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 十月，族灌夫家，棄魏其侯市。
cells.translation: Tenth month, exterminates Guan Fu family, executes Wei Qi Hou in market.
Nan Yi first establishes postal stations.

cells.content: 太中大夫衛青為車騎將軍，出上谷；衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，出鴈門；大中大夫公孫敖為騎將軍，出代；太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，出雲中：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Grand Palace Attendant Wei Qing becomes Chariot Cavalry General, exits Shanggu; Guard Commander Li Guang becomes Brave Cavalry General, exits Yanmen; Grand Palace Attendant Gong Sun Ao becomes Cavalry General, exits Dai; Master of Carriages Gong Sun He becomes Light Chariot General, exits Yunzhong: all strike Xiongnu.

cells.content: 車騎將軍青出雁門，擊匈奴。衛尉韓安國為將屯將軍，軍代，明年，屯漁陽卒。
cells.translation: Chariot Cavalry General Qing exits Yanmen, strikes Xiongnu. Guard Commander Han An Guo becomes Garrison General, army Dai, next year, garrison Yu Yang passes away.

cells.content: 春，車騎將軍衛青出雲中，至高闕，取河南地。
cells.translation: Spring, Chariot Cavalry General Wei Qing exits Yunzhong, reaches Gao Que, takes Henan territory.
Xiongnu enter Ding Xiang, Dai, Shangjun.

cells.content: 匈奴殺代都尉朱英。澤免相。
cells.translation: Xiongnu kill Dai Commandant Zhu Ying. Ze dismissed from chancellor.

cells.content: 八。十一月乙丑，御史大夫公孫弘為丞相，封平津侯。
cells.translation: Eight. Eleventh month yi chou, Imperial Secretary Gong Sun Hong becomes Chancellor, sealed as Ping Jin Hou.

cells.content: 春，長平侯衛青為大將軍，擊右賢。衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，屬青。左內史李沮為強弩將軍，太僕賀為車騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，岸頭侯張次公為將軍，大行息為將軍：皆屬大將軍，擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Chang Ping Hou Wei Qing becomes Grand General, strikes You Xian. Guard Commander Su Jian becomes Roaming Strike General, subordinate to Qing. Left Interior Minister Li Ju becomes Strong Crossbow General, Master of Carriages He becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Dai chancellor Li Cai becomes Light Chariot General, An Tou Hou Zhang Ci Gong becomes general, Grand Usher Xi becomes general: all subordinate to Grand General, strike Xiongnu.

cells.content: 大將軍青再出定襄擊胡。合騎侯公孫敖為中將軍，太僕賀為左將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍。翕侯趙信為前將軍，敗降匈奴。衛尉蘇建為右將軍，敗，身脫。左內史沮為彊弩將軍。皆屬青。
cells.translation: Grand General Qing again exits Ding Xiang strikes Hu. He Qi Hou Gong Sun Ao becomes Middle General, Master of Carriages He becomes Left General, Palace Gentleman Commander Li Guang becomes Rear General. Xi Hou Zhao Xin becomes Front General, defeated surrenders to Xiongnu. Guard Commander Su Jian becomes Right General, defeated, body escapes. Left Interior Minister Ju becomes Qiang Nu General. All subordinate to Qing.

cells.content: 十��中，淮南王安、衡山王賜謀反，皆自殺，國除。
cells.translation: Tenth month middle, Huainan King An, Hengshan King Ci plot rebellion, all commit suicide, states abolished.

cells.content: 匈奴入鴈門、代郡。江都王建反。膠東王子慶立為六安王。弘卒。
cells.translation: Xiongnu enter Yanmen, Dai commandery. Jiangdu King Jian rebels. Jiaodong King son Qing established as Liu An King. Hong passes away.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫樂安侯李蔡為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Imperial Secretary Le An Hou Li Cai becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 冠軍侯霍去病為驃騎將軍，擊胡，至祁連；合騎侯敖為將軍。出北地；博望侯張騫、郎中令李廣為將軍，出右北平。
cells.translation: Champion Hou Huo Qu Bing becomes Biao Qi General, strikes Hu, reaches Qi Lian; He Qi Hou Ao becomes general. Exits Beidi; Bo Wang Hou Zhang Qian, Palace Gentleman Commander Li Guang become generals, exit You Beiping.
Xiongnu enter You Beiping, Ding Xiang.

cells.content: 大將軍青出定襄，郎中令李廣為前將軍，太僕公孫賀為左將軍，主爵趙食其為右將軍，平陽侯曹襄為後將軍：擊單于。
cells.translation: Grand General Qing exits Ding Xiang, Palace Gentleman Commander Li Guang becomes Front General, Master of Carriages Gong Sun He becomes Left General, Director of Honors Zhao Shi Qi becomes Right General, Ping Yang Hou Cao Xiang becomes Rear General: strike Chanyu.
Cai convicted of encroaching on garden wall, commits suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子少傅武彊侯莊青翟為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Crown Prince Junior Tutor Wu Qiang Hou Zhuang Qing Di becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 四月乙巳，皇子閎為齊王，旦為燕王，胥為廣陵王。
cells.translation: Fourth month yi si, imperial son Hong becomes Qi King, Dan becomes Yan King, Xu becomes Guangling King.
Qing Di has crime, commits suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子太傅高陵侯趙周為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Crown Prince Grand Tutor Gao Ling Hou Zhao Zhou becomes Chancellor.

cells.content: 立常山憲王子平為真定王，商為泗水王。六月中，河東汾陰得寶鼎。
cells.translation: Establishes Changshan Xian King son Ping as Zhen Ding King, Shang as Si Shui King. Sixth month middle, Hedong Fen Yin obtains precious tripod.

cells.content: 三月中，南越相嘉反，殺其王及漢使者。八月，周坐酎金，自殺。
cells.translation: Third month middle, Nanyue chancellor Jia rebels, kills their king and Han envoy. Eighth month, Zhou convicted of tribute gold, commits suicide.

cells.content: 四。九月辛巳，御史大夫石慶為丞相，封牧丘侯。
cells.translation: Four. Ninth month xin si, Imperial Secretary Shi Qing becomes Chancellor, sealed as Mu Qiu Hou.

cells.content: 衛尉路博德為伏波將軍，出桂陽；主爵楊僕為樓船將軍，出豫章：皆破南越。
cells.translation: Guard Commander Lu Bo De becomes Subduing Waves General, exits Gui Yang; Director of Honors Yang Pu becomes Tower Ship General, exits Yu Zhang: all defeat Nanyue.

cells.content: 故龍镪侯韓說為橫海將軍，出會稽；樓船將軍楊僕出豫章；中尉王溫舒出會稽：皆破東越。
cells.translation: Former Long Qiang Hou Han Yue becomes Transverse Sea General, exits Kuaiji; Tower Ship General Yang Pu exits Yu Zhang; Commandant Wang Wen Shu exits Kuaiji: all defeat Dong Yue.

cells.content: 秋，樓船將軍楊僕、左將軍荀彘出遼東，擊朝鮮。
cells.translation: Autumn, Tower Ship General Yang Pu, Left General Xun Zhi exit Liaodong, strike Chaoxian.
Reform calendar, makes first month year beginning.
First month wu yin, Qing passes away.

cells.content: 十。三月丁卯，太僕公孫賀為丞相，封葛繹侯。
cells.translation: Ten. Third month ding mao, Master of Carriages Gong Sun He becomes Chancellor, sealed as Ge Yi Hou.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，至余吾水上；游擊將軍韓說出五原；因杅將軍公孫敖：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Er Shi General Li Guang Li exits Shuofang, reaches Yu Wu water; Roaming Strike General Han Yue exits Wu Yuan; Yin Zhu General Gong Sun Ao: all strike Xiongnu.
Winter, He convicted of witchcraft dies.

cells.content: 七月壬午，太子發兵，殺游擊將軍說、使者江充。
cells.translation: Seventh month ren wu, Crown Prince sends troops, kills Roaming Strike General Yue, envoy Jiang Chong.

cells.content: 三月丁巳，涿郡太守劉屈氂為丞相，封彭城侯。
cells.translation: Third month ding si, Zhuojun governor Liu Qu Ju becomes Chancellor, sealed as Peng Cheng Hou.
Sixth month, Liu Qu Ju because of witchcraft beheaded.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，以兵降胡。重合侯莽通出酒泉，御史大夫商丘成出河西，擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Er Shi General Li Guang Li exits Shuofang, surrenders troops to Hu. Chong He Hou Mang Tong exits Jiuquan, Imperial Secretary Shang Qiu Cheng exits Hexi, strike Xiongnu.

cells.content: 六月丁巳，大鴻臚田千秋為丞相，封富民侯。
cells.translation: Sixth month ding si, Grand Herald Tian Qian Qiu becomes Chancellor, sealed as Fu Min Hou.

cells.content: 二月己巳，光祿大夫霍光為大將軍，博陸侯；都尉金日磾為車騎將軍，秺侯；太僕安陽侯上官舛為大將軍。
cells.translation: Second month ji si, Palace Assistant Huo Guang becomes Grand General, Bo Lu Hou; Cavalry Commandant Jin Ri Di becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Ao Hou; Master of Carriages An Yang Hou Shang Guan Juan becomes Grand General.
Filial Zhao Shi Yuan first year
Four. Ninth month, Ri Di passes away.

cells.content: 三月癸酉，衛尉王莽為左將軍，騎都尉上官安為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Third month gui you, Guard Commander Wang Mang becomes Left General, Cavalry Commandant Shang Guan An becomes Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 九月庚午，光祿勳張安世為右將軍。
cells.translation: Ninth month geng wu, Palace Assistant Zhang An Shi becomes Right General.

cells.content: 十二月庚寅，中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.translation: Twelfth month geng yin, Commandant Fan Ming You becomes Du Liao General, strikes Wu Huan.
Third month jia xu, Qian Qiu passes away.

cells.content: 三月乙丑，御史大夫王訢為丞相，封富春侯。
cells.translation: Third month yi chou, Imperial Secretary Wang Xin becomes Chancellor, sealed as Fu Chun Hou.
Twelfth month geng xu, Xin passes away.

cells.content: 十一月乙丑，御史大夫楊敞為丞相，封安平侯。
cells.translation: Eleventh month yi chou, Imperial Secretary Yang Chang becomes Chancellor, sealed as An Ping Hou.

cells.content: 九月庚寅，衛尉平陵侯范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.translation: Ninth month geng yin, Guard Commander Ping Ling Hou Fan Ming You becomes Du Liao General, strikes Wu Huan.

cells.content: 九月戊戌，御史大夫蔡義為丞相，封陽平侯。
cells.translation: Ninth month wu xu, Imperial Secretary Cai Yi becomes Chancellor, sealed as Yang Ping Hou.

cells.content: 四月甲申，光祿大夫龍镪侯韓曾為前將軍。五月丁酉，水衡都尉趙充國為後將軍，右將軍張安世為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fourth month jia shen, Palace Assistant Long Qiang Hou Han Zeng becomes Front General. Fifth month ding you, Water Controller Colonel Zhao Chong Guo becomes Rear General, Right General Zhang An Shi becomes Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 御史大夫昌水侯田廣明。
cells.translation: Imperial Secretary Chang Shui Hou Tian Guang Ming.
Filial Xuan Ben Shi first year

cells.content: 七月庚寅，御史大夫田廣明為祁連將軍，龍镪侯韓曾為後將軍，營平侯趙充國為蒲類將軍，度遼將軍平陵侯范明友為雲中太守，富民侯田順為虎牙將軍：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Seventh month geng yin, Imperial Secretary Tian Guang Ming becomes Qi Lian General, Long Qiang Hou Han Zeng becomes Rear General, Ying Ping Hou Zhao Chong Guo becomes Pu Lei General, Du Liao General Ping Ling Hou Fan Ming You becomes Yunzhong governor, Fu Min Hou Tian Shun becomes Hu Ya General: all strike Xiongnu.

cells.content: 三月戊子，皇后崩。六月乙丑，義薨。
cells.translation: Third month wu zi, Empress passes away. Sixth month yi chou, Yi passes away.

cells.content: 六月甲辰，長信少府韋賢為丞相，封扶陽侯。田廣明、田順擊胡還，皆自殺。充國奪將軍印。
cells.translation: Sixth month jia chen, Chang Xin Minor Treasurer Wei Xian becomes Chancellor, sealed as Fu Yang Hou. Tian Guang Ming, Tian Shun strike Hu return, all commit suicide. Chong Guo deprived of general seal.
Tenth month yi mao, establishes Huo Empress.
Four. Third month geng wu, General Guang passes away.

cells.content: 二月丁卯，侍中、中郎將霍禹為右將軍。
cells.translation: Second month ding mao, Attendant in Emperor's Presence, Commandant Huo Yu becomes Right General.

cells.content: 立太子。五月甲申，賢老，賜金百斤。
cells.translation: Establishes Crown Prince. Fifth month jia shen, honors elders, grants gold one hundred jin.

cells.content: 六月壬辰，御史大夫魏相為丞相，封高平侯。
cells.translation: Sixth month ren chen, Imperial Secretary Wei Xiang becomes Chancellor, sealed as Gao Ping Hou.

cells.content: 七月，安世為大司馬、衛將軍。禹為大司馬。
cells.translation: Seventh month, An Shi becomes Grand Commandant, Guard General. Yu becomes Grand Commandant.
Two. Seventh month ren yin, Yu waist cut.
Six. Eighth month bing yin, An Shi passes away.

cells.content: 上郊甘泉太畤、汾陰后土。
cells.translation: Emperor suburban sacrifices Ganquan Supreme Altar, Fen Yin Hou Tu.

cells.content: 四月，樂成侯許延壽為強弩將軍。後將軍充國擊羌。酒泉太守辛武賢為破羌將軍。韓曾為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fourth month, Le Cheng Hou Xu Yan Shou becomes Strong Crossbow General. Rear General Chong Guo strikes Qiang. Jiuquan governor Xin Wu Xian becomes Breaking Qiang General. Han Zeng becomes Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 上郊雍五畤。祋祤出寶璧玉器。
cells.translation: Emperor suburban sacrifices Yong five altars. Fen Yin produces precious jade ritual vessels.

cells.content: 四月戊戌，御史大夫邴吉為丞相，封博陽侯。
cells.translation: Fourth month wu xu, Imperial Secretary Bing Ji becomes Chancellor, sealed as Bo Yang Hou.
Four. Fifth month ji chou, Zeng passes away.

cells.content: 五月，延壽為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fifth month, Yan Shou becomes Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 三月壬申，御史大夫黃霸為丞相，封建成侯。
cells.translation: Third month ren shen, Imperial Secretary Huang Ba becomes Chancellor, sealed as Jian Cheng Hou.
Three. Third month ding wei, Yan Shou passes away.

cells.content: 赦殊死，賜高年及鰥寡孤獨帛，女子牛酒。
cells.translation: Pardon death sentences, grant silk to elderly and widowers, orphans, widows, women receive cattle and wine.
Third month ji chou, Ba passes away.

cells.content: 七月丁巳，御史大夫于定國為丞相，封西平侯。
cells.translation: Seventh month ding si, Imperial Secretary Yu Ding Guo becomes Chancellor, sealed as Xi Ping Hou.

cells.content: 太僕陳萬年為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Master of Carriages Chen Wan Nian becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 樂陵侯史子長為大司馬、車騎將軍。太子太傅蕭望之為前將軍。
cells.translation: Le Ling Hou Shi Zi Chang becomes Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General. Crown Prince Grand Tutor Xiao Wang Zhi becomes Front General.

cells.content: 十二月，執金吾馮奉世為右將軍。
cells.translation: Twelfth month, Palace Guard Feng Feng Shi becomes Right General.

cells.content: 二月丁巳，平恩侯許嘉為左將軍。
cells.translation: Second month ding si, Ping En Hou Xu Jia becomes Left General.

cells.content: 中少府貢禹為御史大夫。十二月丁未，長信少府薛廣德為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Central Minor Treasurer Gong Yu becomes Imperial Secretary. Twelfth month ding wei, Chang Xin Minor Treasurer Xue Guang De becomes Imperial Secretary.
Tenth month wu yin, Ding Guo dismissed.

cells.content: 九月，衛尉平昌侯王接為大司馬、車騎將軍。二月，廣德免。
cells.translation: Ninth month, Guard Commander Ping Chang Hou Wang Jie becomes Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General. Second month, Guang De dismissed.

cells.content: 七月，太子太傅韋玄成為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Crown Prince Grand Tutor Wei Xuan Cheng becomes Imperial Secretary.
Third month ren xu new moon, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，御史大夫韋玄成為丞相，封扶陽侯。丞相賢子。
七月，太常任千秋為奮武將軍，擊西羌；雲中太守韓次君為建威將軍，擊羌。後不行。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Grand Master of Ceremonies Ren Qian Qiu becomes Valiant Martial General, strikes Western Qiang; Yunzhong governor Han Ci Jun becomes Establishing Might General, strikes Qiang. Later does not go.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，右扶風鄭弘為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Second month ding you, Right Fufeng Zheng Hong becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 右將軍平恩侯許嘉為車騎將軍，侍中、光祿大夫樂昌侯王商為右將軍，右將軍馮奉世為左將軍。
cells.translation: Right General Ping En Hou Xu Jia becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Attendant in Emperor's Presence, Palace Assistant Le Chang Hou Wang Shang becomes Right General, Right General Feng Feng Shi becomes Left General.

cells.content: 光祿勳匡衡為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Palace Assistant Kuang Heng becomes Imperial Secretary.
Sixth month jia chen, Xuan Cheng passes away.

cells.content: 七月癸亥，御史大夫匡衡為丞相，封樂安侯。
衛尉繁延壽為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Guard Commander Fan Yan Shou becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 六月己未，衛尉楊平侯王鳳為大司馬、大將軍。延壽卒。
cells.translation: Sixth month ji wei, Guard Commander Yang Ping Hou Wang Feng becomes Grand Commandant, Grand General. Yan Shou passes away.

cells.content: 三月丙寅，太子少傅張譚為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Third month bing yin, Crown Prince Junior Tutor Zhang Tan becomes Imperial Secretary.
Twelfth month ding chou, Heng dismissed.

cells.content: 七。八月癸丑，遣光祿勳詔嘉上印綬免，賜金二百斤。
十月，右將軍樂昌侯王商為光祿大夫、右將軍，執金吾弋陽侯任千秋為右將軍。譚免。
cells.translation: Tenth month, Right General Le Chang Hou Wang Shang becomes Palace Assistant, Right General, Palace Guard Yi Yang Hou Ren Qian Qiu becomes Right General. Tan dismissed.
Court Judge Yin Zhong becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 三月甲申，右將軍樂昌侯王商為右丞相。
任千秋為左將軍，長樂衛尉史丹為右將軍。十月己亥，尹忠自剌殺。
cells.translation: Ren Qian Qiu becomes Left General, Chang Le Guard Commander Shi Dan becomes Right General. Tenth month ji hai, Yin Zhong commits suicide by stabbing.
Minor Treasurer Zhang Zhong becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 十月辛卯，史丹為左將軍，太僕平安侯王章為右將軍。
cells.translation: Tenth month xin mao, Shi Dan becomes Left General, Master of Carriages Ping An Hou Wang Zhang becomes Right General.
Fourth month ren yin, Chancellor Shang dismissed.

cells.content: 六月丙午，諸吏散騎光祿大夫張禹為丞相。
六月，太僕王音為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Sixth month, Master of Carriages Wang Yin becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 九月甲子，御史大夫王音為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Ninth month jia zi, Imperial Secretary Wang Yin becomes Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 十月乙卯，光祿勳于永為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Tenth month yi mao, Palace Assistant Yu Yong becomes Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 七月乙丑，右將軍光祿勳平安侯王章卒。
cells.translation: Seventh month yi chou, Right General Palace Assistant Ping An Hou Wang Zhang passes away.
Intercalary month ren xu, Yong passes away.
Fourth month geng chen, Xue Xuan becomes Chancellor.
